fn.p: Suggested citation for this article: Stecher M, Chaillon A, Stephan C, Knops E, Kohmer N, Lehmann C, et al. Pretreatment HIV drug resistance spread in 6 metropolitan regions, Germany, 2001–2018. Emerg Infect Dis. 2020 Oct [ date cited]. https://doi.org/10.3201/eid2610.191506
Preliminary results from this study were presented at the Conference for Retroviruses and Opportunistic Infections (CROI) 2019, March 4–7, 2019, Seattle, Washington, USA.
These first authors contributed equally to this article.
